TopicTitle: How to Make a modded part.

Articles.Content: Can someone explain to me (or show me a video) how to make a part in KSP? I have some awesome ideas for the game but i have no way of making them because i don\'t know how. =P

If you want a new Model, start [here](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=8.0).

 If you want a part with different characteristics, start [here](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=CFG_File_Documentation).

 If you want a part to run new code, go learn C#, then start [here](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=27.0).

 Not sorted by level of difficulty.
